text: The Jameh Mosque of Dezful first and oldest mosque built in Dezful, located in the Dezful County, is located on Imam Khomeini Street. The construction of this mosque is a Sasanian architecture style. == See also == * Jameh Mosque of Khorramshahr * Jameh Mosque of Shushtar == Sources == Category:Mosques in Iran Category:Mosque buildings with domes Category:National Works of Iran Dezful
title: Jameh Mosque of Dezful
